title: Printmakers
brief_description: Shows five outstanding American graphic artists - Warden Day, Karl Schrag, Seong Moy, Gabor Peterdi, and Mauricio Losavsky - at work in their respective studios. Describes the technical skills of each in his individual approach to the art of printmaking.
